dev/lsf/util/time.hpp

00001 // File:        time.hpp
00002 // Description: ---
00003 // Notes:       ---
00004 // Author:      leoxiang <leoxiang727@qq.com>
00005 // Revision:    2015-06-22 by leoxiang
00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include <sys/time.h>
00010 #include <cstdint>
00011 
00012 namespace lsf {
00013 namespace util {
00014 
00015 class Time {
00016 public:
00017     static uint64_t TimeValToMilli(struct timeval const&  tv) {
00018         return tv.tv_sec * 1000 + tv.tv_usec / 1000;
00019     }
00020 
00021     static int64_t TimeValDiff(struct timeval const&  tv1, struct timeval const&  tv2) {
00022         return TimeValToMilli(tv1) - TimeValToMilli(tv2);
00023     }
00024 
00025     static uint64_t Now() {
00026         struct timeval tv;
00027         ::gettimeofday(&tv, nullptr);
00028         return TimeValToMilli(tv);
00029     }
00030 };
00031 
00032 }  // end of namespace util
00033 } // end of namespace lsf
00034
